Detailed Description

Processor creating some data sequence (sample) using user defined script.

The user script must define function named Calc. This function gets one parameter containing zero-based index of sample and it should return sample value. Additionally following global variables are defined and can be used from the calculation script:

  • frame index of calculated frame, increased each time new calculation of complete sample was finished.
  • minValue user defined minimal value.
  • maxValue user defined minimal value.
